verses.verse: Now there was a man <WH376> of Benjamin <WH1144> whose name <WH8034> was Kish <WH7027> the son <WH1121> of Abiel, <WH22> the son <WH1121> of Zeror, <WH9502> the son <WH1121> of Becorath, <WH1064> the son <WH1121> of Aphiah, <WH647> the son <WH1121> of a Benjamite, <WH376> <WH3228> a mighty <WH1368> man <WH1368> of valor. <WH2428>

And he had <WH1961> a son <WH1121> whose name <WH8034> was Saul, <WH7586> a choice <WH970> and handsome <WH2896> [man,] and there <WH369> was not a more <WH4480> <WH2896> handsome <WH2896> person <WH376> than <WH4480> he among <WH4480> the sons <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478> from his shoulders <WH7926> and up he was taller <WH1364> than <WH4480> any <WH3605> of the people. <WH5971>

Now the donkeys <WH860> of Kish, <WH7027> Saul <WH7586>'s father, were lost. So Kish <WH1> said <WH6> to his son <WH7027> Saul, "Take <WH559> now <WH1121> with you one <WH3947> of the servants, <WH4994> and arise, <WH259> go <WH5288> search <WH6965> for the donkeys. <WH1980>"

And he passed <WH5674> through the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of Ephraim <WH669> and passed <WH5674> through the land <WH776> of Shalishah, <WH8031> but they did not find <WH4672> [them.] Then they passed <WH5674> through the land <WH776> of Shaalim, <WH8171> but [they were] not [there.] Then he passed <WH5674> through the land <WH776> of the Benjamites, <WH1145> but they did not find <WH4672> [them.]

When they came <WH935> to the land <WH776> of Zuph, <WH6689> Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> to his servant <WH5288> who <WH834> was with him, "Come, <WH1980> and let us return, <WH7725> lest <WH6435> my father cease <WH1> [to be concerned] about <WH2308> the donkeys <WH4480> and become <WH860> anxious <WH1672> for us."

And he said <WH559> to him, "Behold <WH2009> now, <WH4994> there is a man <WH376> of God <WH430> in this <WH2088> city, <WH5892> and the man <WH376> is held <WH3513> in honor; <WH3513> all <WH3605> that he says <WH1696> surely <WH935> comes <WH935> true. Now <WH6258> let us go <WH1980> there, <WH8033> perhaps <WH194> he can tell <WH5046> us about our journey <WH1870> on which <WH834> we have set <WH1980> out."

Then Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> to his servant, <WH5288> "But behold, <WH2009> if we go, <WH1980> what <WH4100> shall we bring <WH935> the man <WH376>? For the bread <WH3899> is gone <WH235> from our sack <WH3627> and there <WH369> is no <WH369> present <WH8670> to bring <WH935> to the man <WH376> of God. <WH430> What <WH4100> do we have <WH854>?"

And the servant <WH5288> answered <WH6030> Saul <WH7586> again <WH3254> and said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH2009> I have <WH4672> in my hand <WH3027> a fourth <WH7253> of a shekel <WH8255> of silver; <WH3701> I will give <WH5414> [it] to the man <WH376> of God <WH430> and he will tell <WH5046> us our way. <WH1870>"

(Formerly <WH6440> in Israel, <WH3478> when a man <WH376> went <WH1980> to inquire <WH1875> of God, <WH430> he used to say, <WH559> "Come, <WH1980> and let us go <WH1980> to the seer <WH9536>"; for [he who is called <WH7121>] a prophet <WH5030> now <WH3117> was formerly <WH6440> called a seer. <WH9536>)

Then Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> to his servant, <WH5288> "Well <WH2896> said; <WH1697> come, <WH1980> let us go. <WH1980>" So they went <WH1980> to the city <WH5892> where <WH834> <WH8033> the man <WH376> of God <WH430> was.

As they went <WH5927> up the slope <WH4608> to the city, <WH5892> they found <WH4672> young <WH5291> women <WH5291> going <WH3318> out to draw <WH7579> water, <WH4325> and said <WH559> to them, "Is the seer <WH9536> here <WH2088>?"

And they answered <WH6030> them and said, <WH559> "He is; see, <WH2009> [he is] ahead <WH6440> of you. Hurry <WH4116> now, <WH6258> for he has come <WH935> into the city <WH5892> today, <WH3117> for the people <WH5971> have a sacrifice <WH2077> on the high <WH1116> place <WH1116> today. <WH3117>

"As soon as you enter <WH935> the city <WH5892> you will find <WH4672> him before <WH2962> he goes <WH5927> up to the high <WH1116> place <WH1116> to eat, <WH398> for the people <WH5971> will not eat <WH398> until <WH5704> he comes, <WH935> because <WH3588> he must bless <WH1288> the sacrifice; <WH2077> afterward <WH310> <WH3651> those who are invited <WH7121> will eat. <WH398> Now <WH6258> therefore, go <WH5927> up for you will find <WH4672> him at once. <WH3117>"

So they went <WH5927> up to the city. <WH5892> As they came <WH935> into the city, <WH5892> behold, <WH2009> Samuel <WH8050> was coming <WH3318> out toward <WH7122> them to go <WH5927> up to the high <WH1116> place. <WH1116>
Now a day <WH3117> before <WH6440> Saul's coming, <WH935> the Lord <WH3068> had revealed <WH1540> <WH241> [this] to Samuel <WH8050> saying, <WH559>

"About this time <WH6256> tomorrow <WH4279> I will send <WH7971> you a man <WH376> from the land <WH776> of Benjamin, <WH1144> and you shall anoint <WH4886> him to be prince <WH5057> over <WH5921> My people <WH5971> Israel; <WH3478> and he shall deliver <WH3467> My people <WH5971> from the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines. <WH6430> For I have regarded <WH7200> My people, <WH5971> because <WH3588> their cry <WH6818> has come <WH935> to Me."

When Samuel <WH8050> saw <WH7200> Saul, <WH7586> the Lord <WH3068> said <WH6030> to him, "Behold, <WH2009> the man <WH376> of whom <WH834> I spoke <WH559> to you! This <WH2088> one <WH2088> shall rule <WH6113> over My people. <WH5971>"
Then Saul <WH7586> approached <WH5066> Samuel <WH8050> in the gate, <WH8179> and said, <WH559> "Please <WH4994> tell <WH5046> me where <WH335> the seer's house <WH1004> is."

And Samuel <WH8050> answered <WH6030> Saul <WH7586> and said, <WH559> "I am the seer. <WH9536> Go <WH5927> up before <WH6440> me to the high <WH1116> place, <WH1116> for you shall eat <WH398> with me today; <WH3117> and in the morning <WH1242> I will let <WH7971> you go, <WH7971> and will tell <WH5046> you all <WH3605> that is on your mind. <WH3824>

"And as for your donkeys <WH860> which were lost three <WH6> days <WH7969> ago, <WH3117> do not set <WH3117> your mind <WH7760> on them, for they have been found. <WH3820> And for whom <WH4672> is all <WH4310> that is desirable <WH3605> in Israel <WH2532>? Is it not for you and for all <WH3478> your father's household <WH3605>?"

And Saul <WH7586> answered <WH6030> and said, <WH559> "Am I not a Benjamite, <WH1145> of the smallest <WH6996> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel, <WH3478> and my family <WH4940> the least <WH6810> of all <WH3605> the families <WH4940> of the tribe <WH7626> of Benjamin <WH1144>? Why <WH4100> then do you speak <WH1696> to me in this <WH2088> way <WH1697>?"

Then Samuel <WH8050> took <WH3947> Saul <WH7586> and his servant <WH5288> and brought <WH935> them into the hall, <WH3957> and gave <WH5414> them a place <WH4725> at the head <WH7218> of those who were invited, <WH7121> who <WH1992> were about thirty <WH7970> men. <WH376>

And Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to the cook, <WH2876> "Bring <WH5414> the portion <WH4490> that I gave <WH5414> you, concerning which <WH834> I said <WH559> to you, 'Set <WH7760> it aside. <WH5973>'"

Then the cook <WH2876> took <WH7311> up the leg <WH7785> with what was on it and set <WH7760> [it] before <WH6440> Saul. <WH7586> And [Samuel <WH8050>] said, <WH559> "Here <WH2009> is what has been reserved! <WH7604> Set <WH7760> [it] before <WH6440> you [and] eat, <WH398> because <WH3588> it has been kept <WH8104> for you until the appointed <WH4150> time, <WH4150> since I said <WH559> I have invited <WH7121> the people. <WH5971>" So Saul <WH7586> ate <WH398> with Samuel that day. <WH3117>
When they came <WH3381> down <WH3381> from the high <WH1116> place <WH1116> into the city, <WH5892> [Samuel] spoke <WH1696> with Saul <WH7586> on the roof. <WH1406>

And they arose <WH7925> early; <WH7925> and it came <WH1961> about at daybreak <WH7837> that Samuel <WH8050> called <WH7121> to Saul <WH7586> on the roof, <WH1406> saying, <WH559> "Get <WH6965> up, that I may send <WH7971> you away. <WH7971>" So Saul <WH7586> arose, <WH6965> and both <WH8147> he and Samuel <WH8050> went <WH3318> out into the street. <WH2351>

As they were going <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the edge <WH7097> of the city, <WH5892> Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to Saul, <WH7586> "Say <WH559> to the servant <WH5288> that he might go <WH5674> ahead <WH6440> of us and pass <WH5674> on, but you remain standing <WH5975> now, <WH3117> that I may proclaim <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of God <WH430> to you."
